member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application
member.summary: A class that represents an application built on the top of the framework. The class provides basic information about the application and methods for initializing and closing the application.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.remarks: Log events will be written to the current user's temp directory, and the configuration files are assumed to locate in the binary directory.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies a log file path. Can be null in which case the log file will be written to the current user's temp directory. This default location will also be used if specifies an invalid log file.
member.remarks: The configuration files are assumed to locate in the binary directory.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies a log file path. Can be null in which case the log file will be written to the current user's temp directory. This default location will also be used if specifies an invalid log file.
Specifies a directory to search for configuration files. Can be null in which case the configuration files are assumed to locate in the binary directory.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.Close
member.summary: Closes the application by closing all configured startup libraries and the core of the framework.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.CloseInstance
member.summary: Closes the possibly created singleton instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.GetDynamicLibraryContext``2
member.summary: Creates an instance of corresponding to specified dynamic library type and library state type.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.Start
member.summary: Starts the application by initializing the core of the framework and all configured startup libraries.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.StartInstance
member.summary: Creates and starts a new singleton instance.
member.remarks: Log events will be written to the current user's temp directory, and the configuration files are assumed to locate in the binary directory.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.StartInstance(System.String)
member.summary: Creates and starts a new singleton instance.
member.param: Specifies a log file path. Can be null in which case the log file will be written to the current user's temp directory. This default location will also be used if specifies an invalid log file.
member.remarks: The configuration files are assumed to locate in the binary directory.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.StartInstance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and starts a new singleton instance.
member.param: Specifies a log file path. Can be null in which case the log file will be written to the current user's temp directory. This default location will also be used if specifies an invalid log file.
Specifies a directory to search for configuration files. Can be null in which case the configuration files are assumed to locate in the binary directory.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.BinDirectory
member.summary: Gets the binary directory for the framework and application libraries. The return value is null if the application is not initialized.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.ConfigDirectory
member.summary: Gets the configuration directory for the framework and application libraries. The return value is null if the application is not initialized.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.DefaultConfigFileName
member.summary: Gets the name of the default configuration file for the application. Can be null.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.IsInitialized
member.summary: Returns true if the application has been initialized, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the application.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.InitializeAttributeFields(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Initializes those fields that are determined by the attributes of the application XML node.
member.param: Specifies an application XML node based on which to initialize the attribute fields.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.LoadAndValidateRootConfig
member.summary: Loads and validates the root configuration file.
member.returns: Returns an object containing the root configuration. If there is no root configuration file, the return value is null.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.State
member.summary: Defines an enumeration for the states of the application.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.State.Uninitialized
member.summary: The application is uninitialized.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.State.PartlyInitialized
member.summary: The application is only partly initialized, that is, the initialization has not been completed due to an error.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.State.Initialized
member.summary: The application has been successfully initialized.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.Application.m_state

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher
member.summary: Defines a class that watches configuration file changes. This class raises an appropriate event every time a configuration file is created, updated, deleted or renamed in the configuration directory.

remarks.para: The implementation relies on the class. The reason why this class isn't used as such is the fact that it raises multiple events per a single file system operation causing unnecessary configuration updates to take place.

This class queues all file events caused by a single file system operation, which is done by waiting for a certain time period for all these events to occur. After the waiting the class determines which one of the three events, , or , should be raised for the outside subscribers. Renamed events will be converted to series of deleted and created events.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.StartWatching(System.String)
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous watching of configuration file changes.
member.param: Specifies a configuration directory to watch.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.StopWatching
member.summary: Stops the asynchronous watching of configuration file changes.

member.name: E:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.ConfigFileChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a configuration file is changed in the configuration directory associated with this instance.

member.name: E:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.ConfigFileCreated
member.summary: Occurs when a configuration file is created in the configuration directory associated with this instance.

member.name: E:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.ConfigFileDeleted
member.summary: Occurs when a configuration file is deleted in the configuration directory associated with this instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.IsConfigFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a specified file name determines a configuration file.
member.returns: Returns true if the specified file name determines a configuration file, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.OnConfigFileEvent(System.Object,System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Created, Changed, and Deleted events raised by an internal object.
member.remarks: This method does nothing if the watching has been stopped.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.OnConfigFileRenamed(System.Object,System.IO.RenamedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Renamed events raised by an internal object.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.OnError(System.Object,System.IO.ErrorEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Error events raised by an internal object.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.RaiseConfigFileEvent(System.Object)
member.summary: Raises the pending configuration file event for a specified configuration file.
member.remarks: This method does nothing if the watching has been stopped or there is no pending configuration file event for the specified configuration file.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.c_waitTimePeriod
member.summary: Specifies the time period in milliseconds to wait for all file events to occur caused by a single file system operation.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.m_configDirectory
member.summary: Specifies the configuration directory to watch.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.m_configFileEvents
member.summary: Specifies a collection of pending configuration file events. The collection is indexed by the configuration file name.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.m_configFileWatcher
member.summary: Specifies a FileSystemWatcher object that watches configuration file changes in the configuration directory.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.m_syncLock
member.summary: Specifies a synchronization object to handle concurrent access to the fields of this class.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.ConfigFileWatcher.m_timers
member.summary: Specifies a collection of timers corresponding to pending configuration file events. The collection is indexed by the configuration file name.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2
member.summary: Defines a class that simplifies the implementation of dynamic library services. The class acquires a read-lock to the state of the dynamic library and provides access both to the handle and state of the library. In other words, the class saves a developer of a dynamic library from storing the instances of the current handle and state within the library.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the instance, that is, releases the acquired read-lock to the state of the library.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.DynamicLibrary
member.summary: Gets the dynamic library instance.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.LibraryState
member.summary: Gets the library state instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies a dynamic library instance to be associated with the context.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.m_disposed
member.summary: Specifies whether this instance has been disposed.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.m_dynamicLibrary
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.DynamicLibraryContext`2.m_libraryState
member.summary: Stores the property.

member.summary: This exception will be thrown when an error occurs in initialization of a library.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryManager
member.summary: A class that represents a library manager. The library manager is responsible for managing the whole life cycle of libraries including initialization, dynamic configuration changes and closing.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryManager.#ctor(Juhta.Net.Startup.Application)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.
member.param: Specifies an object that will own the instance.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryManager.CloseLibraries
member.summary: Closes all libraries.

remarks.para: After this method has been called, libraries are no longer properly initialized.
This method will be called by the framework manager when the framework is closed.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryManager.GetDynamicLibraryContext``2
member.summary: Creates an instance of corresponding to specified dynamic library type and library state type.

member.summary: Starts an asynchronous watching of configuration file changes.

member.summary: Changes the state of a specified dynamic library.
member.returns: The return value true indicates a successful operation. The return value false means that the operation failed but the current library state was successfully restored as the effective library state.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages
member.summary: A static class that defines the diagnostic messages for this library.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.MessageFactory
member.summary: Gets the instance for creating diagnostic messages.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error001
member.summary: Library '{0}' requires a configuration file '{1}' but there is no such file in the configuration directory '{2}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error002
member.summary: XML configuration file '{0}' does not conform to the configuration schema(s) of the custom XML configurable library '{1}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error003
member.summary: Initialization of the library '{0}' failed.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error004
member.summary: An unexpected error occurred when the library '{0}' was being closed.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Alert005
member.summary: Library Manager detected changes in the configuration but failed to update the states of the associated dynamic libraries. The state of the process may be unstable. Please refer to the log events for more information.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error006
member.summary: An error occurred when the application '{0}' was being started.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Alert007
member.summary: Application '{0}' failed to start. Please refer to the log events for more information.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error008
member.summary: Dynamic library context could not be created because no dynamic library was found with the type '{0}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error009
member.summary: Type of the configuration file '{0}' is not supported. Supported configuration file types are .json, .xml, .config and .ini.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning010
member.summary: Library Manager detected that it is unable to continue monitoring configuration file changes in the configuration directory '{0}'. Therefore, from now on no configuration changes will come into effect on the fly in the process.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning011
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was deleted, but no actions were performed because there were no dynamic libraries associated with this configuration file.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Information012
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was deleted, and the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' was initialized successfully.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error013
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was deleted, but an unexpected error occurred when the states of the associated dynamic libraries were being initialized. NOTE: The state of the process is currently unstable. You should restore the configuration file and possibly restart the process.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error014
member.summary: Configuration file name cannot be null for the configurable library '{0}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning017
member.summary: At least one error occurred when the library '{0}' was closed. All resources and services of this library may not have been completely released or shutted down.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error018
member.summary: An unexpected error occurred when the application '{0}' was being closed.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error019
member.summary: An error occurred when a pending configuration file event was being created for the configuration file '{0}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning020
member.summary: Dynamic configuration changes related to the configuration file '{0}' will probably not come into effect.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error021
member.summary: An error occurred when a pending configuration file event related to the configuration file '{0}' was being raised.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error022
member.summary: Library '{0}' does not exist in the directory '{1}'.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning023
member.summary: Library '{0}' has already been initialized. This library exists at least twice under the libraries XML node in the root library configuration. Please remove duplicate occurrences.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error056
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was deleted, but the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' could not be initialized. The state of the library was left unmodified.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error057
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was deleted, but the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' could not be initialized. NOTE: The state of the library is currently unstable. You should restore the configuration file and possibly restart the process.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error058
member.summary: Default library state could not be created because the library '{0}' does not support the required interface ('{1}').

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error059
member.summary: Processes in the {0} state of the library '{1}' could not be completely stopped.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error061
member.summary: Processes in the {0} state of the library '{1}' could not be started.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning063
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was created or changed, but no actions were performed because there were no dynamic libraries associated with this configuration file.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error064
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was created or changed, but the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' could not be updated. The state of the library was left unmodified.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Information065
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was created or changed, and the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' was updated successfully.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error066
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was created or changed, but the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' could not be updated. NOTE: The state of the library is currently unstable. You should restore the configuration file and possibly restart the process.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error067
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was created or changed, but an unexpected error occurred when the states of the associated dynamic libraries were being updated. NOTE: The state of the process is currently unstable. You should restore the configuration file and possibly restart the process.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error068
member.summary: Library state cannot be created for the library '{0}', because the library doesn't implement any of the required dynamic library interfaces.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error069
member.summary: Library '{0}' cannot be initialized based on the configuration file '{1}', because the library doesn't implement any of the required configurable library interfaces.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error070
member.summary: Processes of the library '{0}' could not be started.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error071
member.summary: An unexpected error occurred when the processes of the library '{0}' were being stopped.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning072
member.summary: At least one error occurred when the processes of the library '{0}' were being stopped. All resources and services of these processes may not have been completely released or shutted down.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning073
member.summary: At least one error occurred when the processes in the {0} state of the library '{1}' were being stopped. All resources and services of these processes may not have been completely released or shutted down.

member.summary: An unexpected error occurred when the processes in the {0} state of the library '{1}' were being stopped.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning076
member.summary: At least one error occurred when the {0} state of the library '{1}' was closed. All resources and services of this library may not have been completely released or shutted down.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Error077
member.summary: An unexpected error occurred when the {0} state of the library '{1}' was being closed.

member.name: F:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryMessages.Warning079
member.summary: Library Manager detected that the configuration file '{0}' was deleted but the state of the associated dynamic library '{1}' could not be initialized. NOTE: The library continues running with the current state.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.Startup.LibraryStateException
